text: The giant armadillo (Priodontes maximus), colloquially tatou, ocarro, tatu- canastra or tat√∫ carreta, is the largest living species of armadillo. It was once found widely through the tropical forests of eastern South America. It now ranges throughout varied habitat as far south as northern Argentina. == Gallery == Giant armadillo.jpg Sleeping Giant armadillo.JPG Category:Endangered species Category:Mammals of South America Category:Xenarthrans
title: Giant armadillo
